title: Windows 7 XE 4.2.2 (x86+x64)[EN-RU] with latest software [2014]
description:
Windows 7 XE 4.2.2 (x86 + x64)[EN-RU] [2014]

version of Windows: 6.1 (build 7601: Service Pack 1)
Available for installation Editorial: Enterprise x86, Enterprise x64
Official site: http://www.microsoft.com
By assembling: development team
Talk Build: c400.ru
Language: English / Russian
Treatment: not required (the installer is already disinfected)

Description:
Feature of this assembly is obviously personalized distribution with minimal deployment time, optimized for speed and versatility. Thus, it suffices to insert the flash-drive and boot from it (it is also possible to install from a 2x DVD drives). The installation process prompts you to select a partition on that machine. After 15-20 minutes, your system will almost completely ready. It will in itself comprise one quality audio player, video codecs to play all video formats, antivirus with updated antivirus database for protection immediately after installation, an office suite, all operating system updates, sets of additional libraries (. NET, C + +, Java, Flash , Silverlight ...), modern Web-browser with a cutoff of advertising and spelling, quick viewer of pictures, defragmenter and extended and safe tool for cleaning the entire system from the accumulated debris. In instolyator and in the same integrated set of drivers for USB, Chipset and Masstorage, making it possible to install a USB 3.0 flash drives and memory cards for various RAID / AHCI controllers.
Assembly based on the original English Windows 7 Enterprise. Default interface language Russian. From the assembly does not cut through aggressive, all changes made to the components had an opportunity to remove / disable the official means by Microsoft.

System requirements:
For x86 systems:
CPU: 32-bit or 64-bit processor with a clock speed of 1 gigahertz (GHz) or higher;
RAM: 1 gigabyte (GB) of random access memory (RAM);
HDD: 20 gigabytes (GB) of hard disk space;
Video: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM driver version 1.0 or higher.

For x64 systems:
CPU: 64-bit processor with a clock speed of 1 gigahertz (GHz) or higher;
RAM: 2 GB of memory (RAM);
HDD: 22 GB of hard disk space;
Video: DirectX 9 graphics device with WDDM driver version 1.0 or higher.

What added:
Integrated Service Pack 1
Integrated updates until 01.04.2014
Integrated driver for USB, Chipset and Masstorage (allows you to install with USB 3.0 and RAID / AHCI controllers)
